entry.def: If you utilize something, you use it.

example.ex: Sound engineers utilize a range of techniques to enhance the quality of the recordings...
example.tran: 音响师运用一系列技术来提高录音质量。

example.ex: Minerals can be absorbed and utilized by the body in a variety of different forms.
example.tran: 人体可通过很多不同形式吸收和利用矿物质。
